channel.title: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?
channel.description: I have 2 clients, one with a old look of a iron plate body, and one with the normal 317 look of a iron plate. How can I change the normal looking iron plate body inventory to look like the old one? Example : [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/bub.png[/img]

item.title: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

Get a new Cache

Read full topic
item.source: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?

item.title: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:445959”]Dump the model and pack it into the cache you’re using…

Can do this via cache suite if you know the model id.

Models are stored in main_file_cache.idx1

This is also client sided and is the wrong section.[/quote]

I dumped and replaced the file 1115, iron plate id, restarted client and nothing changed

Read full topic
item.source: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?

item.title: STILL NEED HELP changing inventory look?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Dump the model and pack it into the cache you’re using…

Can do this via cache suite if you know the model id.

Models are stored in main_file_cache.idx1

This is also client sided and is the wrong section.

Read full topic
